Name: Brightwood "Invigorating" Nightstand
Desc: A nightstand found at the Bimarstan. Made of light Brightwood, it is compact and easy to move around. At the same time, it is still able to effectively store important items. If a doctor is no longer adding medicine into this nightstand, then it means a patient is close to a full recovery.
Source: Learned from Realm Depot Furnishing Blueprint
